name: wallet-wizard
description: Embark on a cryptographic journey with wallet-wizard, a Node.js library that opens portals to multiple blockchain realms. This mystical tool harnesses the ancient art of BIP-39 mnemonics to generate secure wallets for Ethereum, Bitcoin, Solana, and Tezos. Whether you're a seasoned sorcerer of the blockchain world or a novice in the cryptographic universe, wallet-wizard offers a seamless and secure way to create wallets across different chains. Perfect for applications needing multi-chain compatibility, it's your go-to spellbook for generating, managing, and utilizing crypto wallets in your Node.js applications.
author: ChaituKReddy
